title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a credit and a deduction for small political contributions.
content: Citizen Involvement in Campaigns Act of 2005 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow: (1) a $200 tax credit for contributions to a candidate for Federal elective public office or to the national committee of a national political party. And (2) a tax deduction for such political contributions up to $600 .
